about_the_game:
Embark on an epic journey as Robinson Crusoe, a lone castaway stranded on a tropical island in the heart of the 17th-century Caribbean. Inspired by the timeless classic by Daniel Defoe, this action-adventure survival game challenges you to not only endure but conquer the wilds. Explore a dynamic world where every jump and climb uncovers ancient secrets and keeps you ahead of the lurking threat of hostile native tribes. Master the art of survival by crafting essential tools, building shelters, and honing your combat skills to defend against the relentless dangers of the island, be it man or beast. Every decision you make will shape your story in this unforgiving wilderness - will you overcome the odds and unravel the island’s dark mysteries, or will the island claim you as its own?

Key Features:

Survive Against the Odds: From crafting essential tools to hunting for food and shelter, survival is your first priority. Gather resources, build your camp, and defend it against the island's threats.

Engage in Dynamic Combat: Face off against the island’s fierce inhabitants, including the ruthless cannibals. Use a combination of melee and ranged combat, along with stealth tactics, to overcome your enemies.

Explore a Living World: Traverse the island’s diverse biomes, from dense jungles to dark swamps. Discover hidden secrets, ancient ruins, and uncover the story of those who lived and died before you.

Build Alliances: Forge relationships with a diverse cast of characters. Form a strong bond with Friday, your key ally and a friend, and face the challenges of the island together.

Story-Driven Adventure: Dive into a narrative that expands on the classic book, offering a richer story with new twists. Shape the fate of the island through your deeds.

Dynamic Weather and Day/Night Cycle: Adapt to a changing environment where time of day and weather conditions shape your experience. Whether you're facing a storm or stealthily moving under the cover of night, your actions will determine your survival.

Historically Accurate Weapons: Arm yourself with weapons true to the 17th century, including flintlock pistols, muskets, and hand-forged blades. Every weapon is designed to reflect the time period,deepening the immersion and realism of your journey.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains fights with people and animals, killing and basic depictions of injuries. In the game there are visible usage of tobacco, alcohol and other drugs.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 8GB / AMD Radeon RX 580 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 130 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
  • Additional Notes: HDD Supported, SSD Recommended.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700 / AMD Ryzen 5 5500
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT / INTEL Arc A750
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 130 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
  • Additional Notes: SSD Required.

short_description: As Robinson Crusoe, a 17th-century castaway, you must survive on a tropical island in this action-adventure game. Explore a dynamic world, uncover secrets, craft tools, build shelters, and defend against dangers. Your choices shape your fate—will you conquer the wilds or fall victim to them?
